description: At Pfaff, Gill & Ports, Ltd., a Chicago, Illinois, personal injury law firm, we are dedicated to providing high-caliber legal services for individuals that have been seriously injured due to someone else's negligence. Our attorneys are aggressive advocates who genuinely care about clients and will fight to protect their best interests every step of the way...
